Name: Minschima
About the game: In minschima you need find the correct order of moves to restore all the shapes in the board. But there's a catch: all pieces try to move together in the same direction. Features: 90 hand crafted levels Smooth puzzle progression Beautiful color palettes Relaxing ambience and satisfying sound effects Simple and intuitive UI
